actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act for the purpose of exempting from the act for the purpose of exempting from the act individuals who engaged as sellers in a limited number of interstate transactions concerning real estate.

summary.text: Exempts from the provisions of the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act individuals who have not sold 300 or more lots.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Land Sales Full Disclosure Act for the purpose of exempting from the act for the purpose of exempting from the act individuals who engaged as sellers in a limited number of interstate transactions concerning real estate.
